title: Porter's Five Forces Analysis
description: An agent must conduct a Porter's Five Forces analysis for a client in the airline industry based on provided research documents.

tasks.description: Analyze the documents to assess the 'Threat of New Entrants'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent concludes the threat is 'Low' due to high capital costs and regulation, citing sources.

tasks.description: Analyze the documents to assess the 'Bargaining Power of Buyers'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent concludes the power is 'High' due to price comparison websites, citing sources.

tasks.description: Analyze the documents to assess the 'Bargaining Power of Suppliers', 'Threat of Substitutes', and 'Industry Rivalry'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a reasonable assessment for the remaining three forces.

tasks.description: Compile the findings into a summary report, one section for each of the five forces.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a well-structured report summarizing the complete analysis.
